005
006package gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.atomic;
007
008import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.datatype.adapter.MetaschemaDataTypeProvider;
009import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function.InvalidValueForCastFunctionException;
010import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.atomic.impl.DateTimeWithTimeZoneItemImpl;
011import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.type.IAtomicOrUnionType;
012import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.type.InvalidTypeMetapathException;
013
014import java.time.ZonedDateTime;
015
016import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.NonNull;
017
018/**
019 * An atomic Metapath item representing a date/time value in the Metapath system
020 * with an explicit time zone.
021 * <p>
022 * This interface provides functionality for handling date/time values with time
023 * zone information, supporting parsing, casting, and comparison operations. It
024 * works in conjunction with {@link ZonedDateTime} to eliminate time zone
025 * ambiguity.
026 */
027public interface IDateTimeWithTimeZoneItem extends IDateTimeItem {
028  /**
029   * Get the type information for this item.
030   *
031   * @return the type information
032   */
033  @NonNull
034  static IAtomicOrUnionType<IDateTimeWithTimeZoneItem> type() {
035    return MetaschemaDataTypeProvider.DATE_TIME_WITH_TZ.getItemType();
036  }
037
038  @Override
039  default IAtomicOrUnionType<IDateTimeWithTimeZoneItem> getType() {
040    return type();
041  }
042
043  /**
044   * Construct a new date/time item using the provided string {@code value}.
045   *
046   * @param value
047   *          a string representing a date/time
048   * @return the new item
049   */
050  @NonNull
051  static IDateTimeWithTimeZoneItem valueOf(@NonNull String value) {
052    try {
053      return valueOf(MetaschemaDataTypeProvider.DATE_TIME_WITH_TZ.parse(value));
054    } catch (IllegalArgumentException ex) {
055      throw new InvalidTypeMetapathException(
056          null,
057          String.format("Invalid date/time value '%s'. %s",
058              value,
059              ex.getLocalizedMessage()),
060          ex);
061    }
062  }
063
064  /**
065   * Construct a new date/time item using the provided {@code value}.
066   * <p>
067   * This method handles dates with explicit timezone information using
068   * ZonedDateTime. The timezone is preserved as specified in the input and is
069   * significant for date/time operations and comparisons.
070   *
071   * @param value
072   *          a date/time, with time zone information
073   * @return the new item
074   */
075  @NonNull
076  static IDateTimeWithTimeZoneItem valueOf(@NonNull ZonedDateTime value) {
077    return new DateTimeWithTimeZoneItemImpl(value);
078  }
079
080  /**
081   * Cast the provided type to this item type.
082   *
083   * @param item
084   *          the item to cast
085   * @return the original item if it is already this type, otherwise a new item
086   *         cast to this type
087   * @throws InvalidValueForCastFunctionException
088   *           if the provided {@code item} cannot be cast to this type
089   */
090  @NonNull
091  static IDateTimeWithTimeZoneItem cast(@NonNull IAnyAtomicItem item) {
092    IDateTimeWithTimeZoneItem retval;
093    if (item instanceof IDateTimeWithTimeZoneItem) {
094      retval = (IDateTimeWithTimeZoneItem) item;
095    } else if (item instanceof ITemporalItem) {
096      retval = fromTemporal((ITemporalItem) item);
097    } else if (item instanceof IStringItem || item instanceof IUntypedAtomicItem) {
098      try {
099        retval = valueOf(item.asString());
100      } catch (IllegalStateException | InvalidTypeMetapathException ex) {
101        // asString can throw IllegalStateException exception
102        throw new InvalidValueForCastFunctionException(ex);
103      }
104    } else {
105      throw new InvalidValueForCastFunctionException(
106          String.format("unsupported item type '%s'", item.getClass().getName()));
107    }
108    return retval;
109  }
110
111  @NonNull
112  private static IDateTimeWithTimeZoneItem fromTemporal(@NonNull ITemporalItem temporal) {
113    if (!temporal.hasTimezone()) {
114      // asString can throw IllegalStateException exception
115      throw new InvalidValueForCastFunctionException(
116          String.format("Unable to cast the temporal value '%s', since it lacks timezone information.",
117              temporal.asString()));
118    }
119    // get the time at midnight
120    return valueOf(temporal.asZonedDateTime());
121  }
122
123  @Override
124  default IDateTimeWithTimeZoneItem castAsType(IAnyAtomicItem item) {
125    return cast(item);
126  }
127}
